mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DATA_T (BUSI_SEQ, BAR_CODE, EXECUTION_ID, FCT_CD, WC_CD, OPER_TIME, OPER_CHANNEL, OPER_USER, PROC_STATUS, ACCEPT_PARAM, DEAL_PARAM, NODE_CODE, MO, USR_DFN_1, USR_DFN_2, USR_DFN_3, USR_DFN_4, USR_DFN_5, CRT_ID, CRT_IP, CRT_DT ) VALUES ( BUSI_DATA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '${BAR_CODE}', '${EXECUTION_ID}', '${FCT_CD}', '${WC_CD}', '${OPER_TIME}', '${OPER_CHANNEL}', '${OPER_USER}', '${PROC_STATUS}', '${ACCEPT_PARAM}', '${DEAL_PARAM}', '${NODE_CODE}', '${MO}', '${USR_DFN_1}', '${USR_DFN_2}', '${USR_DFN_3}', '${USR_DFN_4}', '${USR_DFN_5}', '${F_USE_CD}', '${CRT_IP}', SYSDATE )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DATA_T
BUSI_SEQ = '${BUSI_SEQ}',
BAR_CODE = '${BAR_CODE}',
EXECUTION_ID = '${EXECUTION_ID}',
FCT_CD = '${FCT_CD}',
WC_CD = '${WC_CD}',
OPER_TIME = '${OPER_TIME}',
OPER_CHANNEL = '${OPER_CHANNEL}',
OPER_USER = '${OPER_USER}',
PROC_STATUS = '${PROC_STATUS}',
ACCEPT_PARAM = '${ACCEPT_PARAM}',
DEAL_PARAM = '${DEAL_PARAM}',
NODE_CODE = '${NODE_CODE}',
MO = '${MO}',
USR_DFN_1 = '${USR_DFN_1}',
USR_DFN_2 = '${USR_DFN_2}',
USR_DFN_3 = '${USR_DFN_3}',
USR_DFN_4 = '${USR_DFN_4}',
USR_DFN_5 = '${USR_DFN_5}',
UPT_ID = '${F_USE_CD}',
UPT_IP = '${UPT_IP}',
UPT_DT = SYSDATE
BUSI_SEQ = '${BUSI_SEQ}'
mapper.select:
SELECT BUSI_SEQ, BAR_CODE, EXECUTION_ID, FCT_CD, WC_CD, OPER_TIME, OPER_CHANNEL, OPER_USER, PROC_STATUS, ACCEPT_PARAM, DEAL_PARAM, NODE_CODE, MO, USR_DFN_1, USR_DFN_2, USR_DFN_3, USR_DFN_4, USR_DFN_5, CRT_ID, CRT_IP, CRT_DT, UPT_ID, UPT_IP, UPT_DT FROM MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DATA_T 1=1
AND BUSI_SEQ = '${BUSI_SEQ}'
AND BAR_CODE = '${BAR_CODE}'
AND PROC_STATUS = '${PROC_STATUS}'

SELECT BUSI_SEQ, BAR_CODE, EXECUTION_ID, FCT_CD, WC_CD, OPER_TIME, OPER_CHANNEL, OPER_USER, PROC_STATUS, ACCEPT_PARAM, DEAL_PARAM, NODE_CODE, MO, USR_DFN_1, USR_DFN_2, USR_DFN_3, USR_DFN_4, USR_DFN_5, CRT_ID, CRT_IP, CRT_DT, UPT_ID, UPT_IP, UPT_DT FROM MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DATA_T 1=1
AND BUSI_SEQ = '${BUSI_SEQ}'
AND BAR_CODE = '${BAR_CODE}'
AND PROC_STATUS = '${PROC_STATUS}'
AND PROC_STATUS IN (${IN_PROC_STATUS})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MES1.R_MES_BUSI_NODE_T (TASK_ID, BUSI_SEQ, BAR_CODE, OPER_TIME, OPER_USER, VAR_NAME, VAR_VALUE, NODE_CODE, NODE_NAME, NODE_KEY, OP_START_TIME, MO, USR_DFN_1, USR_DFN_2, USR_DFN_3, USR_DFN_4, USR_DFN_5, CRT_ID, CRT_IP, CRT_DT ) VALUES ('${taskId}', '${BUSI_SEQ}', '${BAR_CODE}', '${OPER_TIME}', '${OPER_USER}', '${VAR_NAME}', '${VAR_VALUE}', '${NODE_CODE}', '${NODE_NAME}', '${NODE_KEY}', SYSDATE, '${MO}', '${USR_DFN_1}', '${USR_DFN_2}', '${USR_DFN_3}', '${USR_DFN_4}', '${USR_DFN_5}', '${F_USE_CD}', '${CRT_IP}', SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE MES1.R_MES_BUSI_NODE_T WHERE TASK_ID = '${taskId}' AND BAR_CODE = '${BAR_CODE}'
mapper.update:
UPDATE MES1.R_MES_BUSI_NODE_T
TASK_ID = '${TASK_ID}',
BUSI_SEQ = '${BUSI_SEQ}',
BAR_CODE = '${BAR_CODE}',
OPER_TIME = '${OPER_TIME}',
OPER_USER = '${OPER_USER}',
VAR_NAME = '${VAR_NAME}',
VAR_VALUE = '${VAR_VALUE}',
NODE_CODE = '${NODE_CODE}',
NODE_NAME = '${NODE_NAME}',
NODE_KEY = '${NODE_KEY}',
OP_START_TIME = '${OP_START_TIME}',
MO = '${MO}',
USR_DFN_1 = '${USR_DFN_1}',
USR_DFN_2 = '${USR_DFN_2}',
USR_DFN_3 = '${USR_DFN_3}',
USR_DFN_4 = '${USR_DFN_4}',
USR_DFN_5 = '${USR_DFN_5}',
UPT_ID = '${F_USE_CD}',
UPT_IP = '${UPT_IP}',
UPT_DT = SYSDATE
TASK_ID = '${TASK_ID}' AND BAR_CODE = '${BAR_CODE}'
mapper.select:
SELECT TASK_ID, BUSI_SEQ, BAR_CODE, OPER_TIME, OPER_USER, VAR_NAME, VAR_VALUE, NODE_CODE, NODE_NAME, NODE_KEY, OP_START_TIME, MO, USR_DFN_1, USR_DFN_2, USR_DFN_3, USR_DFN_4, USR_DFN_5, CRT_ID, CRT_IP, CRT_DT, UPT_ID, UPT_IP, UPT_DT FROM MES1.R_MES_BUSI_NODE_T 1=1
TASK_ID = '${taskId}',
BUSI_SEQ = '${BUSI_SEQ}',
BAR_CODE = '${BAR_CODE}',

SELECT BUSI_CODE,BUSI_NAME,PROCDEF_KEY,m.NAME_ as PROCDEF_KEY_NM,PRIO_LVL,CASE WHEN PRIO_LVL='1' THEN '一级' WHEN PRIO_LVL='2' THEN '二级' WHEN PRIO_LVL='3' THEN '三级' END AS PRIO_LVL_NM, BUSI_SCOPE,CASE WHEN BUSI_SCOPE='mes' THEN '生产执行' WHEN BUSI_SCOPE='wms' THEN '仓库管理' WHEN BUSI_SCOPE='tpm' THEN '生产维护' END AS BUSI_SCOPE_NM,HIST_URL,BATCH_YN,ENABLE_ALLDAY,MO,USR_DFN_1,USR_DFN_2,USR_DFN_3,USR_DFN_4,USR_DFN_5,CRT_ID,CRT_IP,TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRT_DT,UPT_ID,UPT_IP,TO_CHAR(UPT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPT_DT FROM MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DEF_T b left join MES1.ACT_RE_MODEL m on b.PROCDEF_KEY = m.key_ 1=1 AND BUSI_NAME like '%${BUSI_NAME}%' AND PROCDEF_KEY like '%${PROCDEF_KEY}%'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DEF_T 1=1 AND BUSI_NAME like '%${BUSI_NAME}%' AND PROCDEF_KEY like '%${PROCDEF_KEY}%'

update.foreach:
UPDATE MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DEF_T
BUSI_CODE = '${item.BUSI_CODE}', BUSI_NAME = '${item.BUSI_NAME}', PROCDEF_KEY = '${item.PROCDEF_KEY}', PRIO_LVL = '${item.PRIO_LVL}', BUSI_SCOPE = '${item.BUSI_SCOPE}', HIST_URL = '${item.HIST_URL}', BATCH_YN = '${item.BATCH_YN}', ENABLE_ALLDAY = '${item.ENABLE_ALLDAY}', MO = '${item.MO}', USR_DFN_1 = '${item.USR_DFN_1}', USR_DFN_2 = '${item.USR_DFN_2}', USR_DFN_3 = '${item.USR_DFN_3}', USR_DFN_4 = '${item.USR_DFN_4}', USR_DFN_5 = '${item.USR_DFN_5}', UPT_ID = '${F_USE_CD}', UPT_IP = '${UPT_IP}', UPT_DT = SYSDATE
BUSI_CODE = '${item.BUSI_CODE}' AND PROCDEF_KEY = '${item.PROCDEF_KEY}'

mapper.delete: DELETE MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DEF_T WHERE BUSI_CODE = '${BUSI_CODE}' AND PROCDEF_KEY = '${PROCDEF_KEY}'
mapper.select: SELECT BUSI_CODE,BUSI_NAME,PROCDEF_KEY,PRIO_LVL,BUSI_SCOPE,HIST_URL,BATCH_YN,ENABLE_ALLDAY,MO,USR_DFN_1,USR_DFN_2,USR_DFN_3,USR_DFN_4,USR_DFN_5,CRT_ID,CRT_IP,CRT_DT,UPT_ID,UPT_IP,UPT_DT FROM MES1.R_MES_BUSI_DEF_T 1=1 AND BUSI_CODE = '${BUSI_CODE}' AND PROCDEF_KEY = '${PROCDEF_KEY}'
select wp_type,count(wp_type) from mes_crafts_wp group by wp_type

SELECT WP_CD,WP_TYPE,WP_NM FROM MES_CRAFTS_WP 1=1 AND WP_TYPE = '${WP_TYPE}'
GROUP BY WP_CD,WP_TYPE,WP_NM
